The chunk defines the `_CONFIGURATION_TOUCHSCREEN` EnumDescriptor in a protobuf-generated Python file for Android framework tools (aapt2), specifying touchscreen types including TOUCHSCREEN_UNSET, TOUCHSCREEN_NOTOUCH, TOUCHSCREEN_STYLUS, and TOUCHSCREEN_FINGER. This enum is part of the larger `Configuration` message structure used to describe device configurations in Android development.

_CONFIGURATION_TOUCHSCREEN = _descriptor.EnumDescriptor(

  full_name='aapt.pb.Configuration.Touchscreen',
  filename=None,
  file=DESCRIPTOR,

  values=[

    _descriptor.EnumValueDescriptor(
      name='TOUCHSCREEN_STYLUS', index=2, number=2,
